trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Use data from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs> class to determine which actions to take when the user closes the drop-down list but before the list is closed.
trans-unit.target: 使用的数据来自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs>类，以确定要执行当用户关闭下拉列表，但列表在关闭前的操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> named `ToolStripDropDown1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>名为`ToolStripDropDown1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs" /> class with the specified reason for closing.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的关闭原因初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use data from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs> class to determine which actions to take when the user closes the drop-down list but before the list is closed.
trans-unit.target: 使用的数据来自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs>类，以确定要执行当用户关闭下拉列表，但列表在关闭前的操作。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> is closing.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 关闭的原因。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> named `ToolStripDropDown1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>名为`ToolStripDropDown1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
